Name: Issue 287
Introduction: Happy Friday Everyone, and a happy turkey day to those in the US.  So many great resources in this weeks edition, including adding Widgets to your Xamarin.Forms apps, and a bunch of great videos to watch.  Have a great weekend ❤ Kym

Articles.Title: Huawei Store
Articles.Description: Google services are not available on Huawei. What can you do if you need to support Huawei devices and the Huawei Store
Articles.Author: Boguslaw Blonski

Articles.Title: Become an Android App Bundle expert
Articles.Description: All the resources you need to understand Android App Bundles. Reminder: App bundles will be mandatory for new apps from August 2021.
Articles.Author: Ben Weiss

Articles.Title: Distance-based background location updates on iOS
Articles.Description: How to get distance-based location updates by using iOS region monitoring.
Articles.Author: Rendy Del Rosario

Articles.Title: Can your app be installed on the Apple Silicon Macs
Articles.Description: Apple announced that the new Mac computers with the ARM 64 processor will be able to install compatible iOS & iPad apps. What does that mean, and how can you tell if your app is compatible?
Articles.Author: Saamer Mansoor

Articles.Title: iOS 14 Widgets with Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: As you probably know, Apple’s latest iOS 14 and iPadOS 14 introduced the ability for developers to add widgets to their home screens. This is great news if your app can benefit from the addition of widgets.
Articles.Author: Michael Dimoudis

Articles.Title: Forcing single SwipeViews
Articles.Description: Rick had a need to a collection of SwipeViews on a page, where it is only possible to have a single SwipeView swiped open. Here's how he achieved it.
Articles.Author: Rick van Dijk

Articles.Title: Exploring What's New in Xamarin Essentials 1.6
Articles.Description: Take a look with me at some of the exciting features previewed for Xamarin Essentials 1.6, including integrated APIs and official macOS support!
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Creating a Switch Control in Xamarin.Forms Using Shapes and Paths
Articles.Description: In this post Jesus Angulo shows how to create a Switch control using Shapes and Paths in Xamarin.Forms. **Note: Post is in Spanish**
Articles.Author: Jesus Angulo

Articles.Title: Simplifying Bindable Properties with Type Converters in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: A Type Converter allows you to convert values from a type to a different type, this is helpful when creating bindable properties in Xamarin Forms because it saves you a lot of time and validation code. In this article, Charlin shows you a few use cases where you can use it.
Articles.Author: Charlin Agramonte

Articles.Title: Reverse engineering published Xamarin Forms apps.
Articles.Description: You should always be aware that storing secrets in your client side is a dangerous thing. In this post Angel Garcia shows how easy it is to crack open an App.  Most importantly, he covers some guidelines you should follow to protect your secrets.
Articles.Author: Angel Garcia

Articles.Title: Dear Gerald...
Articles.Description: Gerald answers some questions about Xamarin Forms, .NET MAUI, MVU, MVVM, Xamarin Community Toolkit and his t-shirt.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Smaller, Faster, Better Apps
Articles.Description: James is continuing his series of building your very first Xamarin apps. In this video he talks about properly configuring and optimizing your Xamarin projects.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Restaurant App in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: Making a beautiful Restaurant app in Xamarin Forms shouldn't be difficult and thanks to Xamarin.Forms Shapes class and CarouselView, this is made possible.
Articles.Author: DevCrux Technologies

Articles.Title: Toronto Mobile Devs Meetup - Microsoft Identity for Mobile Devs
Articles.Description: If you ever had to deal with identity within your solutions then this is the session for you. Join Christos to find out how to implement authentication and authorization for your apps using the Microsoft Identity platform.
Articles.Author: Toronto Mobile Developers

Articles.Title: Retrieving and Deserializing JSON
Articles.Description: Getting data from a remote server or REST API is a big part of any app. In this video we will learn how to get JSON data from an ASP.NET Core Web API and deserialize that.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: 5 Things about Xamarin.Forms 5
Articles.Description: Xamarin.Forms 5 is almost here and it has some surprising changes that you need to be aware of! In this video, we will see what are the 5 most notable changes and I will talk you through what that means to you.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Announcing the Release of the Git Experience in Visual Studio
Articles.Description: If you have upgraded Visual Studio you might have noticed that GitHub accounts are now integrated into Visual Studio 2019 with a fully integrated GitHub account experience.
Articles.Author: Pratik Nadagouda

Articles.Title: Announcing Azure Mobile Apps v4.2.0 for .NET
Articles.Description: The Azure Mobile Apps client libraries enabled you to provide online and offline sync of cloud SQL data to your apps. The recent release of v4.2.0 updated all core platforms.
Articles.Author: Adrian Hall
